mapper.sql: invitation_id, u_id, title, content, attachment, good, no_good, collect, transmit, price, partitions_id, u_top, u_private, tag, created_at, updated_st, deleted, look
mapper.select: select u.u_id,u.nick_name,u.portrait,u.attention_count,i.title,i.content,i.i_or_m,i.good,i.no_good,i.created_at,i.look from t_user u INNER JOIN t_invitation i on u.u_id = i.u_id ORDER BY invitation_id desc limit #{x},#{y}

select i.u_id,u.nick_name,u.portrait,i.title,i.content,i.price,i.look,i.created_at,ui.is_attention,ui.is_good,ui.is_no_good,ui.is_collect,ui.is_buy from t_user u LEFT JOIN t_invitation i on u.u_id=i.u_id LEFT JOIN t_user_invitation ui on ui.invitation_id=i.invitation_id where i.invitation_id=#{invitation} and ui.u_id = #{userId}

select i.u_id,u.nick_name,u.portrait,i.title,i.content,i.price,COALESCE(0,ui.is_attention),COALESCE(0,ui.is_good),COALESCE(0,ui.is_no_good),COALESCE(0,ui.is_collect),COALESCE(0,ui.is_buy) from t_user u LEFT JOIN t_invitation i on u.u_id=i.u_id LEFT JOIN t_user_invitation ui on ui.invitation_id=i.invitation_id where i.invitation_id=#{invitation}
